channel.title: New here
channel.description:
Hey, Im Ryan. New to these forums but still a highly addicted half life player.
I looked around the black mesa source site and couldnt find a release date, all Ive found is 2009.
I probably missed it some where. Can anyone tell me when the projected release of this remake is?
Oh yea, sorry if this is in the wrong part of the forums.
Awesome looking work, cant wait to play!
And one more thing, whats a recommended minimum system requirements to play the new game?
Thanks,
Ryan

item.title: New here
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
FlaMarine412:

Hey, Im Ryan. New to these forums but still a highly addicted half life player.

I looked around the black mesa source site and couldnt find a release date, all Ive found is 2009.

I probably missed it some where. Can anyone tell me when the projected release of this remake is?

Oh yea, sorry if this is in the wrong part of the forums.

Awesome looking work, cant wait to play!

And one more thing, whats a recommended minimum system requirements to play the new game?

Thanks,
Ryan

Sup, a little bit missed here, there a cafeteria section out there, this thread in particular:
https://www.blackmesasource.com/forums/showthread.php?t=89

EDIT:
Shit, ninja’d by over 9000 people, including OP himself :facepalm: :ninja: Better of go to bed.
EDIT2:

Lolipopkid:

Welcome Flamarine! Look out for Drityoldbastard!

This post (apart from your overall post history) makes me facepalm and wonder why the fuck you are still here.

Read full topic

item.title: New here
item.dc:creator: FlaMarine412
item.description:
I’ll admit I didnt do much looking around when I got on the forums but thank you for all the links and responses.

Especially yours Mangled*, yours is right on the money.

I went ahead and introduced myself in that one thread. Enjoy the pics =)

Read full topic

item.title: New here
item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
Black Mesa will be released some time in the next 157 days.

Read full topic

item.title: New here
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Hi there and welcome!

For your convenience we also have a few other threads for you to start off with:

There is the Introductions and Thanks - Share your appreciation and say hello thread

There is the Introduce yourself thread

There is the FAQ thread

As well as the Ask a question thread

Optional… You can also post your pic in this thread “Post your Picture” and it will be included in the black mesa forum faces thumbnail gallary found here: https://www.catzeyes93.com/images/blackmesafaces/index.html

Read full topic

item.title: New here
item.dc:creator: JCH152
item.description:
This is the requirements for Half-Life 2: Episode 2. The system requirements will probably be simmilar to this:

Minimum: 1.7 GHz Processor, 512MB RAM, DirectX® 8 level Graphics Card, Windows® Vista/XP/2000, Mouse, Keyboard, Internet Connection

Recommended: Pentium 4 processor (3.0GHz, or better), 1GB RAM, DirectX® 9 level Graphics Card, Windows® Vista/XP/2000, Mouse, Keyboard, Internet Connection

Read full topic

item.title: New here
item.dc:creator: awsgames
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

To play it right, you’ll probably going to want to buy an Orange Box game and see how that works. If you can barely run TF2 or Portal or Ep2, you definitely won’t be able to run Black Mesa.

fix’d.

Read full topic

item.title: New here
item.dc:creator: Lolipopman
item.description:
Welcome Flamarine! Look out for Drityoldbastard!

Read full topic

item.title: New here
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
The mod will come out in 2009. there is no specific release date. It could come out next week, for all we know.

To play it right, you’ll probably going to want to buy an Orange Box game and see how that works. If you can barely run TF2 or Portal or Ep2, you probably won’t be able to run Black Mesa very well, either.

Read full topic
